.. _`design_system_components_radio`:

Radio
=====

.. figure:: images/component_radio.png
   :align: center


Description
-----------

Radio component that enables the input and display of boolean options (checked/unchecked).
In contrast to the :ref:`design_system_components_checkbox` component users can only select one radio component per group.
